props.closeDelay: Delay (in ms) after which menu closes (when open-on-hover prop is set to true).
props.debounce: Duration before tooltip is shown and hidden when hovered.
props.internalActivator: Designates whether to use an internal activator.
props.openDelay: Delay (in ms) after which tooltip opens (when `open-on-hover` prop is set to **true**).
props.openOnClick: Designates whether the tooltip should open on activator click.
props.openOnHover: Designates whether the tooltip should open on activator hover.
props.tag: Specifies a custom tag for the activator wrapper.
